testcase.name: User Endpoints /GET users Should GET all the users
User Endpoints /GET users with an id Should GET a user
User Endpoints /GET users with an id Should return a Bad request : id is not valid
testcase.classname: Should return a Bad request : id is not valid

testcase.name: User Endpoints /POST log in a user Should login a user
User Endpoints /POST log in a user Should not login a user. Invalid credentials
testcase.classname: Should not login a user. Invalid credentials

testcase.name: User Endpoints /POST create a user Should create a user
User Endpoints /POST create a user Should not create a user (Body invalid)
testcase.classname: Should not create a user (Body invalid)

testcase.name: User Endpoints /POST create a user Should not create a user (User exist)
testcase.classname: Should not create a user (User exist)

testcase.name: User Endpoints /PATCH update a user Should update a user with success
testcase.classname: Should update a user with success

testcase.name: User Endpoints /PATCH update a user Should not update user. (Password unmatched)
User Endpoints /PATCH update a user Should not update user. (Body not valid)
testcase.classname: Should not update user. (Body not valid)

testcase.name: User Endpoints /PATCH update a user Should not update user. (User already exist)
testcase.classname: Should not update user. (User already exist)

testcase.name: User Endpoints /PATCH update a user Should not update user. (Request id invalid from the given token)
testcase.classname: Should not update user. (Request id invalid from the given token)

testcase.name: User Settings Endpoints /GET userSettings Should get the first user settings
testcase.classname: Should get the first user settings

testcase.name: User Settings Endpoints /GET userSettings Should unauthorized to get user settings
testcase.classname: Should unauthorized to get user settings

testcase.name: User Settings Endpoints /GET userSettings Should unauthorized from bad token
User Settings Endpoints /PATCH userSettings Should update user settings
User Settings Endpoints /PATCH userSettings Should unauthorized to update user settings
testcase.classname: Should unauthorized to update user settings

testcase.name: User Settings Endpoints /PATCH userSettings Should unauthorized update from bad token
testcase.classname: Should unauthorized update from bad token
